ssot__LoyaltyPartnerProduct__dlm.name: Loyalty Partner Product
ssot__LoyaltyPartnerProduct__dlm.description: The Loyalty Partner Product DMO represents a product offered by a loyalty program partner, such as a coupon from another company.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to business unit or other internal organization that owns business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified record.

ssot__LoyaltyPartnerCategoryId__c.description: A reference ID to category designated for loyalty partner, for example, alliance or bilateral.

ssot__LoyaltyPartnerStatusId__c.description: A reference ID to status of loyalty partner.

ssot__LoyaltyPartnerTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to type of loyalty partner.

ssot__LoyaltyProgramId__c.description: A reference ID to marketing strategy designed to encourage customers to shop at or use the services of business associated with program.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Loyalty Partner Product DMO.

ssot__PartnerAccountId__c.description: A reference ID to account of partner to loyalty program.

ssot__PartnerIndustryId__c.description: A reference ID to primary economic activity of partner, for example automotive or retail.

ssot__PartnershipEndDate__c.description: The date when a loyalty program partnership expires.

ssot__PartnershipStartDate__c.description: The date when a loyalty program partnership begins.

ssot__PartyId__c.description: A reference ID to the parent party, for example, an individual, business, or affiliation group.
